problem.markdown:
>>What is the best environmental science response to a request for more electricity generation capacity?<<
() build a new coal powerplant () build a new oil powerplant () build a new natural gas powerplant () increase size and capacity of an existing natural gas powerplant (x) increase conservation and efficiency of existing infrastructure
[explanation] From an environmental science perspective increasing conservation and efficiency are always the best and first response to demands for more energy. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the best environmental science response to a request for more electricity generation capacity?

choicegroup.label: What is the best environmental science response to a request for more electricity generation capacity?
choicegroup.choice: build a new natural gas powerplant
increase size and capacity of an existing natural gas powerplant
increase conservation and efficiency of existing infrastructure
